mapper.insert: insert into member( member_id, member_pwd, member_name, member_email, member_age, member_nickname, member_tel, member_gender ) values ( #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAge}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberTel}, #{memberGender} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_id = #{member_id}
